long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a Chrome browser extension based on the classic game "Flappy Bird". It offers users a simple and fun mini-game that can be played in the browser at any time, helping to relieve stress from work or study.
What is the Flappy Bird Chrome Extension?
The Flappy Bird Chrome Extension is a tool that brings the popular Flappy Bird game to the Chrome browser. It allows users to open a small window to play this simple yet addictive game while browsing the web. The goal of the game is to control a small bird, making it fly between pipes to achieve the highest possible score.
How to Play the Flappy Bird Chrome Extension:
1. After installing the extension, click on the extension icon in the Chrome toolbar to open the game window.
Click the screen or press the spacebar to make the bird fly.
Control the bird to pass through the gaps between the pipes, earning 1 point for each pair of pipes passed.
The game ends if the bird hits a pipe or the ground.
Click the screen to restart after the game ends.
Other Questions Users Might Have:
1. Will this extension affect browser performance?
No, the game runs only in a separate pop-up window and won't affect the main browser window's performance.
2. Is game data saved?
Yes, the game records and saves your high score.
Does this extension require special permissions?
The extension only needs basic storage permissions to save high scores and doesn't need access to your browsing data.
Does the game have sound?
Yes, the game includes simple sound effects to enhance the gaming experience.
Can I customize the game's appearance?
The current version doesn't support customization, but this feature might be added in future updates.
This Flappy Bird Chrome Extension provides users with a simple and fun way to relax between work or study sessions. It's easy to use, doesn't interfere with normal browsing, and is a great choice for passing time.
